name: Mad Merchants 1.0
description:
Mad Merchants is a business-strategy game for Windows. If features 4 uniquely hilarious fantasy races on Mars, battling for the top spot of the business world.

The game only supports 4-player local multiplayer - there is no single-player, AI opponents or online component.

The game was developed with Game Maker Studio 2 as a part of Pelifarmi -program (https://www.pelifarmi.fi/) in under 4 months.
